item.title: How to be disconnected from things ?
item.description: In the last post “What is your Why ?”, we all know “To live is to connect” Connect people Connect wires Connect the Internet Connect events Connect THINGS But, TIME will f*ck up everything from its order. It makes connected things disconnected ! It’s painful, but at least that’s called life. We have thousand ways to disconnect from things in each context. In Electricity : just capping electrical wires or plug it out, … In Computer Network : building a firewall then blocking packets from its source, or easier just to plug the cable out from network card, … In Traveling : destroy road, bridge In Phone : blocking contact from incoming number, or change your new number, or just throw your phone out the windows In Social Networks : un-follow, un-friend, or block people from your network.
